name: Chalet View Lodge
description: Nestled in the heart of the High Sierra, Chalet View Lodge is a boutique resort where rustic elegance meets modern comfort in a serene forest setting. Crafted from timber and stone, this mountain retreat sprawls across 10 picturesque acres — offering lodge rooms, terrace suites, and private cabins surrounded by sweeping views of forests, streams, and alpine trails.
shortDescription: Timber-and-stone boutique resort on 10 acres with on-site brewery, spa, 9-hole course, and mountain luxury.
highlights: Two restaurants: Eureka Peak Brewing Co. & Kitchen+Bar
Seasonal pool, hot tub & catch-and-release fishing pond

faqs.question: How close is Chalet View Lodge to golf courses?
faqs.answer: Dragon at Nakoma is 15 minutes, Graeagle Meadows is 12 minutes, Plumas Pines is 15 minutes, and Whitehawk Ranch is about 25 minutes.

faqs.question: What room types work best for golf groups?
faqs.answer: The rustic cabins and villas are ideal for groups — villas offer multiple bedrooms, full kitchens, and private outdoor space. Resort rooms work well for individual golfers.

faqs.question: Does Chalet View Lodge have dining on-site?
faqs.answer: Yes. Eureka Peak Brewing Co. offers craft beers on tap with wood-fired pizzas, bratwurst, and dishes made with local seasonal ingredients.

faqs.question: Is there a spa at Chalet View Lodge?
faqs.answer: Yes, they offer full spa services. The resort was also featured as one of National Geographic's premier mountain getaways.

contentParagraphs: Nestled in the heart of the High Sierra, Chalet View Lodge is a boutique resort where rustic elegance meets modern comfort in a serene forest setting. Crafted from timber and stone, this mountain retreat sprawls across 10 picturesque acres — offering 33 resort rooms, 9 terrace suites, and 7 private cabins surrounded by sweeping views of forests, streams, and alpine trails. Featured in National Geographic's Lakes & Mountains collection, it's a destination that lives up to the hype.

Wake to the scent of pine and adventure outside your door: hike, snowshoe, bike, or tee off on the resort's 9-hole executive golf course. After exploring, unwind by the seasonal outdoor pool and hot tub, spa, volleyball courts, or the charming catch-and-release fishing pond. The resort also offers bocce ball, basketball, horseshoe pits, and a playground.

Inside, enjoy thoughtful amenities — cozy accommodations with lofted seating, in-room tablets, Nespresso coffee machines, and exclusive Molton Brown bath products. Personal assistant services via IVY text keep everything at your fingertips. Dine on locally inspired fare at two on-site restaurants: savor artisan brews paired with seasonal plates at Eureka Peak Brewing Co., or enjoy garden-view dining at Kitchen+Bar.

Chalet View Lodge is more than a stay — it's a luxurious mountain escape, a premier wedding venue, and a gathering spot for family and friends. With full spa services, tranquil surroundings, and staff known for warm hospitality, it's a place you'll want to return to time and again.

testimonials.quote: Stayed at Chalet View Lodge for our golf trip and it was the perfect home base. Rooms were clean and spacious, location was ideal for hitting courses around Graeagle. GTHS got us a group rate we couldn't find anywhere else.
testimonials.author: Greg D.

testimonials.quote: We've stayed at several Graeagle properties for golf trips and Chalet View Lodge is now our go-to. Great amenities, solid dining options, and the rooms are comfortable after a long day on the course.
testimonials.author: Tony P.

testimonials.quote: Chalet View Lodge exceeded our expectations. The staff was incredibly accommodating with our group of 24 — early breakfast, late checkout, bag storage. Everything GTHS promised about this property was accurate.
testimonials.author: Rebecca R.
